core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mixing 'Godly' warmth with 'Neo-Brutalist' rawness.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like popping a confetti cannon.
Contrast: Hard black borders against soft cream backgrounds and neon accents.
Negative Space: Generous padding to let the bold typography breathe.

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lexend+Mega:wght@100..900&family=Outfit:wght@100..900&display=swap');

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Lexend Mega' for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em). Uppercase for labels.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Outfit' for all paragraphs and UI text. High legibility.
usage_rules.weights: Bold (700) or Black (900) for headers. Regular (400) or Medium (500) for body.

usage.secondary: Acid Lime (#A3E635) - Success states, badges, secondary buttons.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay on the background if possible (opacity 0.05).
visual_enhancers.decorations: Use confetti-like geometric shapes (triangles, circles) in absolute positions for empty spaces.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for containers. Gap-6 or Gap-8 for grids.
layout.container: Max-width 1200px. Centered but with asymmetrical internal layouts.

buttons.style: px-6 py-3 bg-primary text-white font-bold border-2 border-black shadow-neo hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-neo-hover transition-all active:translate-x-[4px] active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-none rounded-md uppercase tracking-wide

variants.secondary: bg-white text-black border-2 border-black shadow-neo hover:bg-lime

cards.style: bg-white border-2 border-black shadow-neo p-6 rounded-lg relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: h-12 border-2 border-black rounded-md px-4 focus:ring-0 focus:shadow-neo transition-all bg-white

badges.style: px-3 py-1 border-2 border-black rounded-full font-bold text-xs uppercase tracking-wider bg-accent

hero_party.description: Happy friends partying - Use for Hero section or Landing page visual.

cake_minimal.description: Minimal birthday cake - Use for 'Add Birthday' form or Empty State.

friends_laughing.description: Friends laughing - Use for Testimonials or Community section.

gift_box.description: Gift box - Use for 'Upcoming Birthdays' card decoration.

guidelines: Buttons must have a tactile 'press' effect (scale 0.98 or translate).
Modals should pop in with a spring animation (type: 'spring', bounce: 0.5).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on colored backgrounds meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use black text on Lime/Yellow/Cream.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible thick black outline (ring-2 ring-black ring-offset-2) for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

setup: Install dependencies: yarn add framer-motion react-fast-marquee clsx tailwind-merge
Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and box-shadows defined above.
Import the Google Fonts in index.css.
implementation_strategy: 1. Create a 'Layout' component that applies the cream background and global padding.
2. Build a reusable 'NeoButton' and 'NeoCard' component to enforce the design system.
3. For the Dashboard, use a Bento Grid: Large 'Upcoming Birthday' hero card, smaller 'Stats' cards, and a tall 'Calendar' list.
4. Use the 'cake_minimal' image for the empty state when no birthdays are added.
5. Ensure the 'Add Birthday' form feels like an invitation card, not a tax form.
universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients. Stick to solid, bold colors.
DO NOT use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the 'neo' classes.
Always add data-testid to interactive elements.
